name: HP
desc: Hit points. The unit is removed from the battle if HP reaches 0.

name: Str
desc: Strength. The higher the number, the more damage you inflict.

name: Mag
desc: Magical power. Increases spell and staff effectiveness.

name: Skill
desc: Fighting skill. A higher number improves accuracy.

name: Spd
desc: This affects both evasion and attack speed.

name: Con
desc: Constitution. Affects how well the unit can wield heavier weapons.

name: Move
desc: The distance you can move in one turn.
